ImyaTweaks.Title: Items stackable - Custom Size of Item Stack in Ships

ModOp.Path: //Asset[Template='GuildhouseItem' or Template='HarborOfficeItem' or Template='TownhallItem' or Template='VehicleItem' or Template='ShipSpecialist' or Template='ActiveItem' or Template='ItemSpecialAction' or Template='CultureItem']/Values/Item/MaxStackSize

ImyaExpose.Description: Sets the stack size for all items. Notice that for values above 100, the UI might not show the full number, but '99+'. [Default = 99]
